chapters.title: Chapter 4: The Pattern Groans
chapters.info: Noam, p. 90—Man from Jarra; Simion's brother. He is similar build to Perrin, and has the same ability to talk to wolves. Unlike Perrin and Elyas, Noam has lost any sense that he was ever human. See also Aybara, Perrin t'Bashere; Boundless; Machera, Elyas.
